      • printItemDetail

        public String printItemDetail()
        Prints a menu item's details. Formatted to fit a console table of size 60.
        Returns:
        Parsed string of the Menu Item.

      • menuTypeChecker

        public static boolean menuTypeChecker(ArrayList<MenuItem> menuArrayList,
                                      int newPromoItemType,
                                      String textParameter)
        Returns true if the filtered array list contains the menu item type.
        Parameters:
        menuArrayList - filtered array list that contains menu items based on enum specified
        newPromoItemType - type of the menu item added to the promotion
        textParameter - text for the menu item type
        Returns:
        True if found, false otherwise

      • retrieveMenuItem

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable MenuItem retrieveMenuItem(int targetItemID)
        Method returning a MenuItem object that matches the input targetItemID. Uses MainApp.menuItems to retrieval operations.
        Parameters:
        targetItemID - ID of the menu item object to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        menuItemObj Object containing menu item attributes.

      • retrieveMenuItemListFiltered

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable ArrayList<MenuItem> retrieveMenuItemListFiltered(MenuItem.MenuItemType targetItemType)
        Method returning an ArrayList filtered by enum type. Uses MainApp.menuItems to retrieval operations.
        Parameters:
        targetItemType - type of the menu item objects to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        menuItemsFiltered ArrayList containing the menu item type selected
